Test Name: Infliximab Quantitation with Antibodies to Infliximab (ATI), Serum
Purpose: To quantify infliximab levels and detect antibodies to infliximab in patient serum for therapeutic drug monitoring and clinical decision-making.
Container: Serum tube (e.g., clot tube/SST) with aliquoted, properly labeled tubes for storage
Equipment: Centrifuge, calibrated micropipettes, microplate reader, vortex mixer, refrigerator (2-8 °C), freezer (-20 °C or lower)
